ContentDesc_Arkadion - Schwergewicht R1: The first opponent of your cruiserweight campaign is to be the shameless playboy of Solution Nine, Dancing Green. Wielding the soul of a terrible toad, he prefers to engage his opponents in duels of dance, using his heightened abilities to command the dance floor. If you are to claim victory, you shall need more than might and magicâ”€indeed, you shall need a sense of rhythm.
Instancecontenttextdata_40714_Text: Oof! Will the challenger be alright!?
Instancecontenttextdata_40718_Text: Amazing! They clearly anticipated that attack!
Instancecontenttextdata_40721_Text: Oh no, that was too much for the challenger!
Instancecontenttextdata_40722_Text: The challenger's down! Is this the end!?
Instancecontenttextdata_40723_Text: The challenger rises again! Can they turn this around!?
Instancecontenttextdata_40724_Text: They're back on their feet! Let's see if they can stay standing!
Instancecontenttextdata_42401_Text: Are you ready to get down?
Instancecontenttextdata_42403_Text: Can you keep up with the rhythm?
Instancecontenttextdata_42404_Text: Dancing Green is pulling out all the stops with these steps!
Instancecontenttextdata_42405_Text: We're just getting started! Keep groovin', baby!
Instancecontenttextdata_42406_Text: On the dance floor, everyone's a star!
Instancecontenttextdata_42407_Text: Bask in the spotlight and burn, baby, burn!
Instancecontenttextdata_42408_Text: An invitation to dance! How will the challenger respond?
Instancecontenttextdata_42411_Text: Let's turn up the heat! Try to keep up, now!
Instancecontenttextdata_42412_Text: The fever's taken hold! Can the upstart keep up with Dancing Green?
Instancecontenttextdata_42415_Text: You're burnin' up the dance floor, baby!
Instancecontenttextdata_42417_Text: Not bad, but I reckon you've got more in you!
Instancecontenttextdata_42420_Text: Yeah, baby! I feel the fever comin' on again!
Instancecontenttextdata_42421_Text: The night's reached a fever pitch! All eyes are on Dancing Green!
